task.title: Add path traversal validation for agent names

events.content: Added path traversal validation at two layers: Added path traversal validation at two layers

raw.question: Added path traversal validation at two layers
raw.chosen: Added path traversal validation at two layers
raw.reasoning: GitHub code scanning flagged js/path-injection on lines 396,398 where agent name is used in file paths. Added validation in: 1) RelayPtyOrchestrator constructor (throws Error), 2) AgentSpawner.spawn() (returns error result). Rejects names containing '..', '/', or '\\'.

retrospective.summary: Added defense-in-depth path traversal validation for agent names. Rejects names containing '..' '/' or '\\' at both spawner entry point and orchestrator constructor.
